alert.note: Alert for Central Grant County, Silver City Area; East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Region Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel; Upper Gila River Valley; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 5:24AM MST until January 08 at 4:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest New Mexico. * WHEN...From 10 AM Sunday to 4 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and outdoor decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds combined with snow Sunday night may create areas of lower visibility. These strong winds and much cooler temperatures will also make for dangerous wind chills Sunday night and Monday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
